meanings.definition: (Computer-based Learning Environment Infrastructure) コンピュータベースの学習環境基盤
meanings.english_definition: (Computer-based Learning Environment Infrastructure) An infrastructure for computer-based learning environments.

examples.sentence: CLEI is an important part of modern education.
examples.translation: CLEIは現代教育の重要な部分です。

etymology.value: Acronym of Computer-based Learning Environment Infrastructure
